full_summary:
======================================

### Expiration of Solicitation: Intervention Program for Dead and Distressed Marine Animals

The Government of Canada has issued an Expiration Notice for the Solicitation Reference Number 30004792, which pertains to the provision of intervention services for dead and distressed marine animals in the province of Quebec. Below are the key details of the solicitation:

#### Notice Details

* Title: Intervention Program for Dead and Distressed Marine Animals
* Reference Number: 30004792-A
* Amendment Number: 6
* Solicitation Number: 30004792
* Publication Date: October 17, 2023
* Closing Date: November 1, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Hours local time)
* Expected Start Date: November 20, 2023
* Expected End Date: March 31, 2025

#### Description of Work

The successful proponent is required to provide services aimed at reducing accidental mortalities of marine mammals, rescuing marine mammals in difficulty, and promoting the acquisition of knowledge from dead, stranded, or endangered animals drifting in the waters of the St. Lawrence bordering Quebec. The provider is expected to support the operation of the Emergency Center for Marine Mammals (CUMM) and possess a mobile response team responsible for responding to incidents involving live animals and dead animals.

#### Key Performance Areas

* Effective operation of CUMM to report incidents involving marine animals via a toll-free telephone number (90%)
* Coordination and, where possible and safe, response to the needs of marine animals in difficulty (10%)

#### Procurement Information

* Category: SRV – Services (Roster)
* Method: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Capital-Nationale (Quebec), Quebec (except National Capital Region) (NCR)

#### Contact Information

Contact inquiries regarding this solicitation can be addressed to Karine Plante, Contracting Authority at [DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca) or (506) 377-9127.

#### Attachment and Documents

Please refer to the Notice of Solicitation document provided at the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22245/30004792---ac
